Description: Load switch / eFuse-lite with programmable current limit + reverse blocking
Notes: Default ON via EN pull-up. Current limit fixed at 200mA.
Pulls EN HIGH for default ON state.
Optional but recommended for robustness. (GPIO26 / physical 37)

Description: Solder jumper to force OFF by default

Notes: Place close to U_SENS_SW OUT and near sensor connectors.

Nets: 3V3_IN, GND, I2C_SDA, I2C_SCL, ADC_AIN0, ADC_AIN1, ADC_AIN2, ADC_AIN3
Notes: Use for voltage measurement only; place in analog island. I2C address 0x48 (ADDR to GND).
